item.title: Continously updated crime report draft criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and its accomplices
item.description: Excerpts from Draft Number 27. The content I am currently publishing online comprises only about one tenth of the entirety of Draft Number 27. TLDR; EXECUTIVE SUMMARY: McDonald’s Corporation and its accomplices have engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity as defined under the Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations (RICO) Act in Title 18 of the United States Code, Section 1961(5). This crime report is written under duress. So far, I have received multiple serious threats, thereby constituting the crime of witness tampering as defined under Title 18, Section 1512 of the U.
